LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipShearableIsShearable: Set the shearability for this animal Changing this setting requires reloading to apply the settings!
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipShearableDef: Set the item produced by shearing this animal (Not restricted to wool!)
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipShearableIntervalDays: Set the interval between shearing in days
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipShearableAmount: Set the amount of wool produced per shearing
